metadata.name: Law Like Love: The Judge
metadata.description:
Law Like Love series are based on my never-ending fascination with the poetry of W.H. Auden. 

In this mini series, I have fed stanzas of his poem Law Like Love with additional words and tweaks to the AI to generate a set of images which were further trained and edited in Photoshop.

It is a great poem and it has led to a strange mix of images with scattered words sometimes discernible, authoritative characters resembling either a judge or a president at times and pieces of city life tossed in between. Love seems to have appeared less than Law here. Interesting..

While the set of images were larger, I have chosen 6 images to represent the series which I hope to mint.

...

Law Like Love: The Judge
by Hulki Okan Tabak
on Foundation
in Vagabondo collection
1/1 minted on December 2021
